title: Firefly Season 1 DVDRip Xvid (Eng Audio + Eng Subtitles)
description:
Firefly
============================================================================
TV-series (2002-2004)

IMDB page: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0303461/

This is simply the best TV-series ever.

Dont look at the episodes order listed on IMDB. They have the order of airings by FOX. The REAL episodes order intended by shows creator is the one presented here, on this DVDRip.

There are english subtitles for all of the episodes except for the DVD Special Features.
